item.description:
The Island of Bali - May 25, 2013

Join Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this incredibleGroup Trip to the Island of Bali!

>>>>CLICK HERE for trip details & itinerary

May 25 - June 1, 2013 join a group of fun, like-minded people and explore the wonders and beauty of the most famous Indonesian island with this 8 day group tour through majestic Bali. You'll travel through lush interior mountains, explore local villages, taste amazing coffee from area plantations, view picturesque rice terrace gardens, and so much more. Best of all, you'll spend plenty of time at the famous Kuta beach... a fantastic way to start and end this amazing adventure!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

GET THE SCOOP! Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Pricing and Booking:

NOTE: a meetup RSVP does NOT reserve your space. For prices, details and to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

PRICE: $1,399

CLICK HERE to book your spot.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this adventure:
* Global Expeditions Club Trip Leader
* Expert local guide on tour
* 8 Days, 7 Nights in excellent local hotels
* 4 day guide island tour around the island
* Visit the famous Banjar Hot Springs
* Short guided walk through a picturesque Bali rice field
* Visit to the Ubud market
* Visit to several Balinese Temples
* Breakfast daily, lunch on tour
* Private transportation between cities

Need help booking your airfare? Just email me or give me a call at 1.617.645.7689

Click Here For Complete Details and Booking.

Places Visited: Bali Group Tour, Bali, Indonesia, Kuta, Denpasar, Ubud, Candidasa, Lovina, Banjar Hot Springs, Lake Beratan, Bedugul

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 20,000+ members. Check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page to see what members are saying about these trips.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: BALI: Beaches & Mountains Group Trip - 8 Days
